Job Description:

As a Data Engineer you will be responsible for supporting Ferguson’s new data engineering platform that leverages the Azure cloud architecture as well as current IBM and Oracle data platforms. Experience and understanding of relational and non-relational database systems and associated application support. You will be part of a production support team responsible for administration of applications in the cloud and on-premises to support data availability and reporting.

Responsibilities:
  • Ensure data is accurate and readily available to our business customers
  • Interfacing with business customers, gathering requirements and developing new datasets in data platform
  • Assist in architecting and designing automation processes for the ETL jobs
  • Identifying the data quality issues to address them immediately to provide great user experience
  • Extracting and combining data from various heterogeneous data sources
  • Support platforms that can provide ad-hoc access to large datasets
  • Modeling data and metadata to support machine learning and AI
  • Work rotational 24x7 on-call support as needed
Basic Qualifications:
  • Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, or related field
  • 1-2 years relevant experience supporting Azure platforms with an emphasis in data management
  • 2+ years of Microsoft Database Development / Business Intelligence experience
  • Data Warehousing Experience with SQL Server, Oracle, Redshift, Teradata, etc.
  • Experience with one or more of the following technologies: NoSQL databases, MongoDB, Hadoop, Hive, Hbase, Pig, Spark, Elasticsearch etc.
  • Experience in using Python, Java and/or other data engineering languages
  • Knowledge and experience of SQL, SSIS, SSAS, and PowerBI
  • Excellent communication, analytical and collaborative problem-solving skills
  • Demonstrated ability to work effectively as part of a team
Nice to have:
  • Industry experience as a Data Support Engineer or related specialty with a track record of manipulating, processing, and extracting value from large datasets.
  • Experience building/operating highly available, distributed systems of data extraction, ingestion, and processing of large data sets
  • Experience building data products incrementally and integrating and managing datasets from multiple sources
  • Experience in large-scale data warehousing and analytics projects, including using Azure or AWS technologies – SQL Server, Redshift, S3, EC2, Data-pipeline, Data Lake, Data Factory and other big data technologies
  • Experience providing technical expertise and mentorship to junior engineers for knowledge transfer
  • Demonstrable track record dealing well with ambiguity, prioritizing needs, and delivering results in an agile environment
  • Working knowledge and/or experience with Power BI (Power BI Online, Power BI Desktop) and related tool
  • Experience with Analysis Services development, testing and deployment, with a particular focus on SQL Server Analysis Services
  • Working knowledge and/or understanding of Azure-based tools and services that support analysis, mining and reporting, e.g. Analysis Services (PaaS), Azure SQL Data Warehouse, HDInsight, Data Lake Analytics, Stream Analytics, Cognitive Services, Spark etc.
  • Experience with custom application development using .NET, Java, JavaScript, PowerShell, and/or related technologies and frameworks
  • Microsoft Certifications a plus
